content.raw:
I can't find the SendToBaseStation method from the examples. Getting this error below.
Is there another way of sending found artifacts to the base station? If I'd use SendTo, what should be the base station address?

/home/cfotache/subt_seed_ws/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:164:20: error: ‘class std::unique_ptr<subt::CommsClient>’ has no member named ‘SendToBaseStation’
       this->client.SendToBaseStation(artifact);
content.html:
I can't find the SendToBaseStation method from the examples. Getting this error below. Is there another way of sending found artifacts to the base station? If I'd use SendTo, what should be the base station address?

/home/cfotache/subt_seed_ws/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:164:20: error: ‘class std::unique_ptr<subt::CommsClient>’ has no member named ‘SendToBaseStation’ this->client.SendToBaseStation(artifact);
